body_html: Well since you are casting a floating point tensor to an integer type and all the values in your tensor are smaller than zero, doesn't it make sense that you obtain all zeros at the end? What was the behaviour in the previous version?
body_text: Well since you are casting a floating point tensor to an integer type and all the values in your tensor are smaller than zero, doesn't it make sense that you obtain all zeros at the end? What was the behaviour in the previous version?
body: Well since you are casting a floating point tensor to an integer type and all the values in your tensor are smaller than zero, doesn't it make sense that you obtain all zeros at the end? What was the behaviour in the previous version?
